label: Martins, Luciana & Marcos Tavares.  2018. A new genus and species of Sclerodactylidae (Echinodermata: Holothuroidea: Sclerothyoninae) from the Pacific coast of Panama, and assignment of  Neopentamera anexigua to Sclerothyoninae. Zootaxa 4426(1): 157–164.
